ApiTokens.description: Array of API tokens associated with the server

Color.description: Color code associated with the server for visualization purposes

SmtpApiActivated.description: Flag to indicate if SMTP API is activated for the server

RawEmailEnabled.description: Flag to enable/disable raw email processing

DeliveryType.description: Type of delivery mechanism used by the server

ServerLink.description: Link to access server details or dashboard

InboundHookUrl.description: URL to which inbound events are sent for processing

BounceHookUrl.description: URL to which bounce events are sent for processing

OpenHookUrl.description: URL to which open events are sent for processing

DeliveryHookUrl.description: URL to which delivery events are sent for processing

PostFirstOpenOnly.description: Flag to track opens only after the first open event

InboundHash.description: Hash value associated with inbound processing

InboundSpamThreshold.description: Spam threshold limit for inbound emails

IncludeBounceContentInHook.description: Flag to include bounce content in the hook data

ClickHookUrl.description: URL to which click events are sent for processing

EnableSmtpApiErrorHooks.description: Flag to enable/disable SMTP API error hooks
